$values.Text: IAS remote telescope startup template / TEST VERSION for test-shutter-open script WITHOUT MANUAL CONFIRMATION
Version 0.5 / 2023-07-03 / Martin Junius
Default: High Gain Mode
Additional safety check, will stop the sequence if the shutter is NOT OPEN
Generic template for IAS remote telescope, NEO observations by Dieter Husar
Used by nina-create.sequence.py
